description: Their OTC Stride running sock features Graduated Light Compression [15-20 mmHg] for long-haul support. Redesigned performance fit zones combat fatigue, while new mesh flex windows pair perfectly with our ultra-lightweight Merino Wool to keep you comfortable— from the starting line through the final push.
name: Darn Tough Socks Stride Over-The-Calf Ultralight Running Socks - Mens

specs.value: Ultra Lightweight (For the ultimate like-it’s-not-even-there fit and feel, ultra-lightweight yarns give our running socks the lowest in-shoe profile)
No slipping, no bunching, and no blisters
Unprecedented durability and our unique “put it on, forget it’s on” feel
Pulls moisture away from skin. Fast drying
Cool in the summer, warm in the winter
Undetectable seam fusion for an ultra smooth, invisible feel
